name: Spanish Rice, Buffalo Tempeh wrap with Kale, Bell Pepper
description: These Vegan Buffalo Tempeh Wrap s are paired with spanish rice, peppers and kale for a fantastic meal. Use gluten-free wraps to make them gluten free.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 teaspoon chili powder or to taste
Additions: a Tablespoon of tomato paste or a 1/4 cup fresh salsa.
2 Tablespoons hot sauce + 1 Tablespoon Sriracha + 1-2 Tablespoons melted earth balance butter/oil
Or 2 Tablespoons Sriracha + 2 Tablespoons extra virgin olive oil + 2 teaspoons vinegar
Or 1/3 cup of your favorite Buffalo sauce
1  package 4 oz 3 grain Tempeh (use gluten-free Tempeh or black beans for gf)
1  Red bell pepper thinly sliced or equivalent roasted red bell pepper

recipeInstructions.text: For the Spanish rice:
recipeInstructions.name: For the Spanish rice:

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and rinse the rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Wash and rinse the rice.

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the rinsed rice in about 1 teaspoon of oil for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Toast the rinsed rice in about 1 teaspoon of oil for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the tomato and onion (and a pickled jalapeno if using) into a chunky puree.Add the tomato onion puree and spices and water to the rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the tomato and onion (and a pickled jalapeno if using) into a chunky puree.Add the tomato onion puree and spices and water to the rice.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix well, cover and cook on low-medium heat, until rice is tender. 15-20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix well, cover and cook on low-medium heat, until rice is tender. 15-20 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a few Tablespoons chunky salsa into the rice when done (optional).
recipeInstructions.name: Add a few Tablespoons chunky salsa into the rice when done (optional).

recipeInstructions.text: For the Tempeh:
recipeInstructions.name: For the Tempeh:

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the Tempeh into thin 1/4 inch slices. (Steam Tempeh before using to reduce the bitter taste if that is bothersome. Boil for 8 minutes in water, slice and use).
recipeInstructions.name: Slice the Tempeh into thin 1/4 inch slices. (Steam Tempeh before using to reduce the bitter taste if that is bothersome. Boil for 8 minutes in water, slice and use).

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 2 teaspoons oil in a pan and heat on medium heat. Add the tempeh to the pan and cook on both sides until golden brown. 2-3 minutes each side.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat 2 teaspoons oil in a pan and heat on medium heat. Add the tempeh to the pan and cook on both sides until golden brown. 2-3 minutes each side.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove tempeh from pan and Add 2-3 tablespoons of Buffalo sauce, enough to coat and let it sit until ready to use. This can be made ahead and kept.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove tempeh from pan and Add 2-3 tablespoons of Buffalo sauce, enough to coat and let it sit until ready to use. This can be made ahead and kept.

recipeInstructions.text: In the same pan, roast the red bell peppers in a little oil until brown on the edges. Or slice roasted red bell peppers and use.
recipeInstructions.name: In the same pan, roast the red bell peppers in a little oil until brown on the edges. Or slice roasted red bell peppers and use.

recipeInstructions.text: Assemble the wrap:
recipeInstructions.name: Assemble the wrap:

recipeInstructions.text: Prep and start the rice for cooking. Meanwhile, make the buffalo tempeh.
recipeInstructions.name: Prep and start the rice for cooking. Meanwhile, make the buffalo tempeh.

recipeInstructions.text: Roast/cook the red bell peppers. Then chop and blanch(cook in boiling water for a minute or 2) or massage the kale and keep ready. or use raw washed Kale.
recipeInstructions.name: Roast/cook the red bell peppers. Then chop and blanch(cook in boiling water for a minute or 2) or massage the kale and keep ready. or use raw washed Kale.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the tortillas on a napkin or work surface.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the tortillas on a napkin or work surface.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread buffalo sauce on the wrap. Or use hummus spiked with the buffalo sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread buffalo sauce on the wrap. Or use hummus spiked with the buffalo sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Top with spanish rice. Top with Tempeh.
recipeInstructions.name: Top with spanish rice. Top with Tempeh.

recipeInstructions.text: Top with Kale, then Red Bell pepper
recipeInstructions.name: Top with Kale, then Red Bell pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Top with cilantro or parsley.
recipeInstructions.name: Top with cilantro or parsley.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Roll it up. Cut and serve or carry for lunch.
recipeInstructions.name: Roll it up. Cut and serve or carry for lunch.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the leftover Spanish rice(there might be some left) on the side.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve the leftover Spanish rice(there might be some left) on the side.
